# Rizhiyi Provider

The Rizhiyi provider can interact with the resources supported by Rizhiyi. 


<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->

## Example Usage
Terraform 0.13 and later:
```
terraform {
  required_providers {
    rizhiyi = {
      version = "~> 1.0.0"
      source  = "terraform-rizhiyi.com/rizhiyiprovider/rizhiyi"
    }
  }
}

```
